sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
<Navbar v-if="category" :category="category"/>
<Carousel v-if="category && $route.meta.showLayout" :category="category"/>
<router-view v-if="category" :categories="category"/>

    <!-- <Footer/> -->
  </section>
</template>

    <script>
    import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
    // import Footer from './components/Footer.vue';
    import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
    import Carousel from './components/Carousel.vue';
    import axios from 'axios';
    export default {
      data() {
        return {
          category:null,
          userData: {},
        }
      },
      components:{
        Navbar,Carousel
      },
      methods: {
        authVerify(){
          axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/checkLogin")
          .then(user => user ? this.userData = user : this.userData = {name:"ali",surname:"berk",tel:05416455351} )
          .catch(err => console.log(err))
        }
      },
      async mounted() {
        this.authVerify();
        console.log(this.userData);
      try {
        const res = await fetch("/db.json");
        if (!res.ok) throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${res.status}`);
    
        const data = await res.json();
        this.category = data.categories;
        console.log(this.category);
      } catch(err) {
      console.error("Veri alınamadı", err);
      }
      }

    }
    </script>

<style>
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

#categoryCarousel{
  display: grid;
}
.hero-img {
  object-fit: cover;
  max-height: 700px;
  width: 100vw;
}
a {
  text-decoration: none;
  max-height: 100px;
  font-size: 18px;
}
i {
  font-size: 25px;
}

</style>
